subject: Dear friend,
body:
Dear friend,
How are you and your family today? I hope everybody is fine. It has
been quite a long time and i know you may have forgotten everything
about me, Anyways, i haven't forgotten you yet, i still remember your
past effort to help me in making claims to that inheritance fund,
though your corporation were not enough to make the successful
completion of the fund claim but all the same, I am happy to inform
you today that i did later by the grace of God completed the
transaction successfully with the help of another partner.
The total fund was transferred to the new partner that I presented for
the transaction after you defaulted. Now I am outside my country for
an investment project with my partner.
However, I did  not forget your past efforts and assistance to me to
see that the fund was approved and released, So,  I  decided to
compensate you for that support then, i left with my secretary, an ATM
CARD that contains the sum of US$500,000.00 which would be delivered
to you once you contact her with your current address.
Please, accept this token of appreciation and God bless you. Below is
the contact details of my secretary:
Name: Ms. Sheffon Lawrence
Email: 
sheffonlawrence@gmail.com
You should contact her at your earliest convenience so that the ATM
CARD can be sent to you on time without delays.
I wish you the best in all your future endeavors. I would be very busy
from now onwards due to the project we are working on and might be out
of communication but whatever thing you need to know, my secretary
shall be there for you, corporate with her and make sure you will
always heed to her instructions and advice to enable you have the card
without delays.
Regards, Marybeth Monson

subject: Re:    Dear friend,
body:
Dear Marybeth Monson,

I hope this message finds you well. I must admit, your email took me by surprise as it has indeed been a long time since we last communicated. 

I am glad to hear that you were able to successfully claim the fund and have now embarked on an investment project. Your success is truly inspiring.

Thank you for remembering my past efforts and offering to compensate me with an ATM card containing US$. This is a generous gesture which I greatly appreciate.

Please provide me with the contact details of your secretary so I can reach out to her regarding the delivery of the ATM card.

Wishing you all the best in your current project and future endeavors.

Best wishes,
Phil
